name: NOCLIP
description:
NOCLIP is a chapter-based liminal exploration game.Story 1: "Rescue"
March 27th, 2002
Dr. Oscar Andersen, a scientist working for the state-funded 'Icarus Research' organization embarks on a rescue mission, what happened to the group of 4 that got lost?



More chapters are to come in the form of free updates.

  • Authentic Camcorder Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in the atmospheric setting of the early 2000's.
  • Varying Environments: From an abandoned office to a huge mall, explore a range of environments that compose the eerie tapestry of liminal spaces.

Heavily inspired by the works of KANE PIXELS
